pages.text: $(li)In this world there are a large number of hats that can be used to customize your character.$(br)$(li)These do not give you attributes or effects, they are merely decorative.

$(li)Sometimes you may come across a creature wearing a hat.$(br)$(li)You can slay that creature to obtain its hat.$(br)$(li)Pressing the $(l)H key$() in your keyboard you can access to all your hats.$(br)$(li)In this interface you can select the Hat that you want to wear.
$(li)You can save your favourite hats pressing the $(l)Star button$() and personalize the color of your hats pressing the $(l) Color Circle button$().
